comment.author: 54904823@N00
comment._content: Frederick IX (Christian Frederik Franz Michael Carl Valdemar Georg) (11 March 1899 – 14 January 1972) was King of Denmark from 20 April 1947 until his death. He was the son of King Christian X of Denmark and Queen Alexandrine, born Duchess of Mecklenburg. en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Frederick_IX_of_Denmark

comment.author: 35014516@N03
comment._content: Richard Arthur Norton: Thanks for the more complete info. here.  We'll add it to the record next time we update.
